mapper.insert: insert into mpay (idx, mpaynum, membernum ,mpaymethod, mpayproduct, mpayprice, mpaydate, mpaygym, mpayperiod, mpaytime, trainername, ggoodsnum,tgoodsint, gymnum, cnt) values (idx.nextval, #{mpaynum}, #{membernum}, #{mpaymethod}, #{mpayproduct}, #{mpayprice}, #{mpaydate}, #{mpaygym}, #{mpayperiod}, #{mpaytime}, #{trainername}, #{ggoodsnum}, #{tgoodsint}, #{gymnum}, #{cnt} )
